roleset.name: win a prize/contest

roles.note: This frame differs from win-v.01 in that arg4-'in exchange for' has been omitted, and arg1-'thing won' has been split into 2 separate roles, one for the contest and one for the prize.

example.name: arg0
example.text: And Ralph Nader , who may make the difference between a Gore or Bush win in several places .

example.name: with arg4
example.text: The Mariners can move on to the American League Champion SHN Series with a win over the White Sox this afternoon .

example.name: with arg2
example.text: he and his team are also still optimistic about a win in the recount

example.name: arg0 oblique and adjectival arg2
example.text: It was only the second World Cup win for Hummer who 's been on the national team for five years .
example.arg: for Hummer who's been on the national team for five years

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on win-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls get-13.5.1.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Sinatra's start into show business was the successful win of first prize in the 1935 radio talent program, Major Bowes Amateur Hour.
example.arg: in the 1935 radio talent program, Major Bowes Amateur Hour
